hot short days long sweaty nights the changing of the equinox     you know its seasonal temperatures reading exactly at one o one ran into sublime when i was rolling high on the one o one northbound in tune with the earth sound sound waves and sun beams when im on the microphone i freak beats and rearrange scenes when im on the microphone i make heads bob we smoke hella herb cause herb attracts the gods  take a tip take a tip take a ti-tidip from me rodneys on the microphone with ras m.g all the people in the dance will agree that we are well qualified to represent the lbc me la-la-louie well everybody run to the rhythm it gets harder  you got it got it got it got it keep it comin on  one day i was jogging through the concrete jungle and all of a sudden i slipped on some sublime oooh and landed in the pharcyde its all good doesnt matter sunshine in the air good smoke and good people everywhere you know i know we must stay strong and keep it comin on
